data.event: Strong winds and Large waves along the coast
data.headline: ORANGE WARNING. Strong winds and Large waves
data.description:
Strong winds and large waves are expected along the coastal areas. 
Likelihood of occurrence is HIGH and expected Impacts are MODERATE.
The expected impacts of this phenomenon are widespread of rubbish, falling of leaves and small tree branches, challenge to some of marine activities, scarcity of fish and associated impacts.
data.instruction:
Sea users and Residents of high risk areas are advised TO TAKE ACTIONS

TMA will continue to monitor the situation and issue updates when necessary.
data.area: Coasts of Mtwara, Lindi, Pwani, Dar es salaam, Tanga,  Unguja and Pemba islands

data.headline: Heavy rains
data.instruction: All people living in flood prone areas should vacate before 21st Dec

data.event: Strong winds and Large waves along the coast

data.description:
Strong winds and large waves are expected along the coastal areas. 
Likelihood of occurrence is MODERATE and expected Impacts are MODERATE.
The expected impacts of this phenomenon are widespread of rubbish, falling of leaves and small tree branches, challenge to some of marine activities, scarcity of fish and associated impacts.

data.event: Strong winds and large waves along the coast of Lake Tanganyika
data.headline: YELLOW ADVISORY. Strong winds and large waves
data.description:
Strong winds and large waves are expected along the coastal areas of Lake Tanganyika. 
Likelihood of occurrence is MODERATE and expected Impacts are MODERATE.
The expected impacts of this phenomenon are widespread of rubbish, falling of leaves and small tree branches, challenge to some of marine activities, scarcity of fish and associated impacts.
data.instruction:
Lake users and Residents of high risk areas are advised TO BE AWARE AND STAY ALERT

TMA will continue to monitor the situation and issue updates when necessary.
data.area: Coasts of Kigoma, Katavi and Rukwa.

data.headline: ORANGE WARNING. Strong Winds
data.description:
Strong winds are expected over several parts of the country. 
Likelihood of occurrence is HIGH and expected Impacts are MODERATE.
The expected impacts of this phenomenon are widespread of rubbish, falling of leaves and small tree branches and associated impacts.
data.instruction:
Residents of high risk areas are advised TO TAKE ACTION.

TMA will continue to monitor the situation and issue updates when necessary.
data.area: Regions of Mara, Kagera, Geita, Shinyanga, Mwanza, Kigoma, Tabora,Katavi,Rukwa,Mbeya,Songwe, Njombe, Mahenge, Ruvuma, Mtwara, Lindi, Pwani, Dar es salaam, Tanga,  Unguja and Pemba islands

data.headline: ORANGE WARNING. Large waves
data.description:
Large waves are expected over the coast of Indian Ocean. 
Likelihood of occurrence is HIGH and expected Impacts are MODERATE.
The expected impacts of this phenomenon are challenge to some of sea activities like sea navigation, fishery, recreational and associated impacts.
data.instruction:
Sea users are advised TO TAKE ACTION.

TMA will continue to monitor the situation and issue updates when necessary.
data.area: Coasts of Tanga, Pwani, Dar es salaam, Lindi, Mtwara regions together with Unguja and Pemba isles.
